name: MovieGuru
0:
”Alexa, ask Movie Guru tell me a fact”
”Alexa, ask Movie Guru give me a movie trivia”
”Alexa, ask Movie Guru tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie guru
des: Movie Guru is a skill that sends out interesting movie trivia facts that are possibly not known to everyone. When invoked, the skill speaks out an array of fascinating behind the scene facts about our favorite Hollywood blockbusters that we have enjoyed over the years.
